A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was a disappointing movie\, in my opinion.  It does not follow a traditional Star Wars movie concept and tried to do too much.  Why have all the drama of Rey's parents in Episode 7 and answer in such a dull manner?  What was the point of Finn and Rose in this movie?  Why were Luke and Yoda so bizarre?  All I could see of this movie was the hope of selling Star Wars merchandise and setting up Episode 9.  I always see Star Wars movies at least twice in the theater\, but I will not see this one more than once.
